upcoming.title: Spring Jazz Concert
upcoming.description: Our biggest performance of the year! Join us for an evening of jazz classics and original compositions.

upcoming.title: Winter Arts Festival
upcoming.description: A showcase of all the arts programs at DVHS. We'll be opening the show with some exciting new pieces.

upcoming.title: Valentine's Day Grams
upcoming.description: Our small ensembles will be delivering musical Valentine's Day grams throughout the school.

upcoming.title: Guest Artist Workshop
upcoming.description: A special workshop and jam session with a local professional jazz musician. Open to all club members.

past.title: Performance at Oakmont Senior Center
past.description: An afternoon of jazz classics for the residents. We love these intimate performances and sharing music across generations.

past.title: Performance at Oakmont Senior Center
past.description: An afternoon of jazz classics for the residents. We love these intimate performances and sharing music across generations.

past.title: DVHS Quad Jam Session
past.description: Join us for a casual lunchtime performance in the quad. We'll be playing some upbeat tunes to brighten your day.

past.title: Wellness Center Performance
past.description: Playing some smooth, relaxing jazz to support the school's wellness events. Music is good for the soul!
